articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun at 00:00 on Thursday to pay high tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the WPK.
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice-Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Ri Yong Gil, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, KPA General Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, and other commanding officers of the KPA, commanding officers of the units of all services and army corps level and executive members of the Party Committee of the People's Army.
					
					 He entered the hall where the statues of the great Generalissimos are standing.
					
					 Laid before the statues was a floral basket in the name of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also placed before the statues was a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with other visitors, paid high tribute to the statues of the great Generalissimos.
					
					 Then he entered the hall where Kim Il Sung lies in state. He together with other visitors paid homage to him in the humblest reverence.
					
					 He went round the room where the orders Kim Il Sung received are preserved, the mourning hall and halls that house a train coach and a car he used in his lifetime.
					
					 He then entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state. He together with other visitors paid homage to him in the humblest reverence.
					
					 He went round the room where the orders Kim Jong Il received are preserved and the halls that house a car, an electric car, boat and train coach he used in his lifetime.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Joint Performance Given by Moranbong Band and State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Joint Performance Given by Moranbong Band and State Merited Chorus
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The joint performance "Long Live the Workers' Party of Korea" was given by the Moranbong Band and the State Merited Chorus on Thursday here to celebrate the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un together with Ri Sol Ju appeared in the auditorium.
					
					 Among the audience were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Choe Pu Il, Jo Yon Jun and Thae Jong Su, officials of party and armed forces organs, chief secretaries of the WPK Provincial Committees, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and students in the city.
					
					 It was appreciated by the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas compatriots visiting the socialist homeland.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here, military attaches and their wives, embassy officials and foreign guests staying in the country.
					
					 It began with the prologue "We Sing of the Party". Put on the stage were numbers including female chorus "Ode to the Motherland", instrumental music and song "Fly Higher Our Party Flag" and string quartet "It Is October".
					
					 The performers made a solemn and impressive music representation of the glorious history of the WPK shining with the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, founder of the WPK, and leader Kim Jong Il, its builder.
					
					 The audience was deeply touched by light music and serial songs "O Mother Party which Protected My Destiny" as it expressed profound gratitude to the mother party for building a socialist flower garden with loving care on this land where the people are blessed with the illustrious leaders and the party generation after generation and taking care of the people across the country.
					
					 Male chorus "Our Future Is Bright" and female chorus and chorus "Let's Defend Socialism" reflected the staunch spirit of the DPRK advancing along the road of socialism full of faith in victory.
					
					  The spectators were mesmerized by the fascinating performance the artistes staged by presenting music reflecting the spirit of the stirring times and national emotion in such fresh styles and representations as a combination of Korean style light music, orchestral music and chorus, resonant and rich echo, cheerful tune and gorgeous and peculiar stage decor.
					
					 At the end of the performance, Kim Jong Un waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of the artistes and audience and congratulated the artistes on their successful presentation.
					
					 He said the joint performance staged by the Moranbong Band and the State Merited Chorus is flawless in its ideological contents and artistry, adding that the WPK is proud of having such revolutionary art troupes.
					
					 He assigned the artistes to the task to stage the performance before officials and working people in various fields and youth and students till October 17.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Final Matches in Field of Popular Sports
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Final Matches in Field of Popular Sports
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Final matches of various events in the field of popular sports of the National Sports Contest of Provincial Teams took place with splendor at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Thursday on the significant occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. It has been under way since October 1 here.
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un together with Ri Sol Ju appeared in the grandstand.
					
					 Among the spectators were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Ki Nam, Pak To Chun, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol, Choe Pu Il, Jo Yon Jun and Thae Jong Su and chief secretaries of the WPK Provincial Committees, officials of the party, armed forces, ministries and national institutions, those in the fields of science, education and sports, members of cheering groups from each province, people from all walks of life and youth and students in the city.
					
					 Women's volleyball finals took place between the teams of South Phyongan Province and Nampho City.
					
					 When players gained successive points through prompt and strong smashes and light touches, the spectators enthusiastically cheered and applauded.
					
					 The match ended in the victory of the team of South Phyongan Province.
					
					 Then followed folk sports and amusement games.
					
					 Teams of North Phyongan and South Hamgyong Provinces played breath-taking final Ssirum matches, displaying admirable technique.
					
					 The team of North Phyongan Province placed first in the event.
					
					 The team of South Hwanghae Province came first in running with balls in arms and on head while the team of Nampho City placed first in the relay race.
					
					 The contest reached the climax in the final tug of war event held on the same day.
					
					 Players of the teams of North Phyongan and Jagang Provinces powerfully demonstrated the unity and team spirit in the final tug of war event by displaying their stubborn will and perseverance.
					
					 The team of North Phyongan Province beat its rival.
					
					 Kim Jong Un clapped his hands whenever they played good games in sky-high spirit.
					
					 Team standings were announced and prizes were awarded to the successful teams.
					
					 South Phyongan Province came first in the team standing.
					
					 At the end of the contest Kim Jong Un waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of the players and spectators.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the successful contest, underscoring the need to regularly organize the similar contest in the future and channel efforts into folk sports so as to help everybody make a positive contribution to labor and national defence with strong physical body.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Chinese Party and State Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Chinese Party and State Leaders
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, received a reply message from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, president of the People's Republic of China (PRC) and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC, Li Keqiang, premier of the State Council of the PRC, and Zhang Dejiang, chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the PRC, on Tuesday.
					 The message said:
					
					 We express sincere thanks for your warm congratulations on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the PRC.
					
					 We believe that the traditional Sino-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation would steadily grow stronger by the common efforts of the parties, governments and peoples of the two countries under the new situation in the new period.
					
					 We wish the DPRK prosperity and its people happiness.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from Bashar Al－Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Wednesday.
					 The president said in the message that he was pleased to send sincere and warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the friendly Korean people on October 10, the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea, on behalf of the Syrian people and on his own behalf.
					
					 He expressed his belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily develop in the interests of the peoples of the two countries by common efforts.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the Korean people further progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Political Party Leader 
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from Gennadi Andreyevich Zyuganov, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, on Wednesday.
					 In the message the chairman extended felicitations to Kim Jong Un and the DPRK people on behalf of the C.C., the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 The message said that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung has always been at the head of the struggle of the Korean people for the socialist construction for the last decades. 
					
					 The message went on:
					
					 The DPRK has won great successes in the fields of industry and agriculture, science, education and culture and made great development of the defence capacity under the leadership of the party.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un and the people of the DPRK fresh successes in the work for building a prosperous socialist society, paying high respects to him.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Kicking Up Racket over Inter-Korean Summit Minutes
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Denounces S. Korean Authorities for Kicking Up Racket over Inter-Korean Summit Minutes 
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Thursday released the following statement to denounce the south Korean puppet authorities for kicking up an anti-DPRK racket again over the north-south summit minutes:
					 On Oct. 2, the puppet prosecution of south Korea made public the intermediary investigation results which said that the Roh Moo Hyun's regime did not transfer the 2007 north-south summit minutes to the Archives but saved it in Roh's private database and deleted the draft minutes. 
					
					 The riff-raffs in Chongwadae and the "Saenuri" Party, as if they had waited for it, immediately cried they would open to public the recorded remarks to prove whether the minutes were corrected or not, talking about "the discarded original historic records," "breach of national discipline," "abandonment of northern limit line" and "low attitude". 
					
					 The conservative media joined them in their racket and pressed the opposition forces including those related to the summit talks, as if they had spotted heavy crime. 
					
					 The recent racket defying the DPRK's warnings and denunciation at home and abroad is a reckless act disclosing their true colors as group of wicked politicians and gangs who stoop to any infamy to achieve their sinister political ambition. 
					
					 As we had solemnly declared, the north-south summit minutes are an important matter related not only to the internal affairs of south Korea but also to the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership. 
					
					 There has been no precedent by which minutes of summit between state leaders were made public in the world. 
					
					 But not content with slandering the north-south summit which should be regarded as holy and absolute, the south Korean authorities kicked up the racket over the summit minutes and even declared that it would open to public the recorded remarks. This is the indecorum showing that they are political hooligans and rowdies bereft of elementary diplomatic common sense and courtesy and principle to be observed in holding dialogue. 
					
					 The CPRK bitterly condemns the reckless racket over the summit minutes as a mockery of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and a serious political provocation against it. 
					
					 Now the south Korean regime brings charges against the righteous people, who made contributions to opening of the turning phase for national reunification, over the minutes incident. But the real criminals who should stand trial are the conservative group who totally deny the historic declarations adopted at the north-south summits and try to belittle their great significance and national historic exploits for their party interests and reduce them into the plaything of political strife. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye is behind the immoral and reckless acts. 
					
					 As proven by the Intelligence Service's interference in the presidential election that sparked off a furor in south Korea, it was Park Geun Hye who stooped to infamy to seize "power" with the use of the puppet IS. When the public opinion and people's mindset reached the point of explosion for this, Park posted ill-famed Nam Jae Jun to the puppet IS as its head and instigated him to mastermind the case of minutes and stage the unprecedented farce of the "forces following the north".
					
					 It was also Park Geun Hye regime which plunged the north-south ties into a deadlock, while viciously insulting the dignity of the supreme leadership and social system in the DPRK and mocking at its efforts for dialogue and negotiations, being hell-bent on the provocation of a war against the DPRK in league with the U.S.
					
					 Even at this moment Park is making invectives against the DPRK during her trip to southeastern Asian region.
					
					 The Park regime abused the minutes of summit talks for meeting its sinister aims, not content with escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen out of extreme hostility toward the DPRK. What enrages us most is that the group of despicable and senseless guys claimed "courtesy" and "confidence" whenever an opportunity is presented itself.
					
					 The recent racket of minutes kicked up by the puppet regime is aimed to get rid of its plight tight-cornered at home and abroad for its acts of disrupting the north-south relations, turn the table in its favor, secure a position favorable for winning in the upcoming off-year election and furthermore, contain and strangle pro-reunification patriotic forces and other democratic reformist forces and lord it over in south Korea.
					
					 But its smear campaign will get it nowhere.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain an on-looker to the present situation in which the minutes of the summit between the top leaders of the north and the south are insulted by confrontational maniacs.
					
					 The regime should know that the DPRK can also open to public all the flattering remarks made by rulers of south Korea and their special envoys when they came to the north.
					
					 There is no doubt that south Korea will be thrown into chaos and the present chief executive will find herself in an embarrassing situation in case those remarks are made public.
					
					 The DPRK is closely following the development of the situation in south Korea.
					
					 The puppet regime should behave with discretion, bearing in mind the repeated warnings of the DPRK that it will be made to own full responsibilities for the serious consequences to be entailed by its persistent act of kicking up the racket of minutes, escalating the north-south confrontation.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun 
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions Thursday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. Among the visitors were teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University who will move to new flats presented to them as gifts by the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					 Laid before the statues of the great Generalissimos were a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), and a floral basket in the name of the KPA. 
					
					 A floral basket was laid before the statues in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the halls where the great Generalissimos lie in state, the visitors made bows. 
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the great Generalissimos received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their life.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Lao Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Lao Political Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Lao charge d' affaire to the DPRK Thursday conveyed the floral basket to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Service personnel and people of the DPRK have visited the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, founder and builder of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), to pay tribute to them on the 68th anniversary of the WPK.
					 People visited the statues on Mansu Hill with ardent yearning and in reverence for the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Seen before the statues was a floral basket from Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets, bouquets and flowers in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions, industrial establishments, farms and schools in Pyongyang City.
					
					 The Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front offered a floral basket before the statues.
					
					 The visitors made bows, recalling with deep emotion the immortal exploits performed by the great Generalissimos in party building. 
					
					 A lot of people also visited the statues of Generalissimos and mosaics portraying their smiling images at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other places in Pyongyang.
					
					 Servicepersons, workers, youth and schoolchildren across the country visited the statues of Generalissimos and mosaics depicting their smiling images in their residential areas to pay tribute.

articles.title: First Vice-President of Iran Meets DPRK Minister of Labour
articles.content:
First Vice-President of Iran Meets DPRK Minister of Labour
						
 Tehran, October 10 (KCNA) -- Eshaq Jahangiri, first vice-president of Iran, met and had a talk with the friendly delegation led by DPRK Minister of Labour Jong Yong Su, chairman of the Korea－Iran Friendship Association on a visit to Iran, on October 8.
					 The first vice-president said that he is pleased to see the Korean people registering successes in different fields under the leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed his conviction that the Korean people will overcome difficulties in the near future although the world powers headed by the U.S. pressurize the DPRK. He reaffirmed Iran's support for the peaceful and independent stand of the DPRK.
					
					 He said that the government of Iran attaches great importance to the development of the relations with the DPRK and hopes that the relations between the two countries will grow stronger in all aspects and peace and security be guaranteed on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Friendly Cooperative Relations with DPRK Stressed by Venezuelan President
articles.content:
Friendly Cooperative Relations with DPRK Stressed by Venezuelan President
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Jon Yong Jin, DPRK ambassador to Venezuela, presented his credentials to Nicolas Maduro Moros, president of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, on October 2.
					 At the meeting the president expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger on the principle of mutual respect and in the bilateral interests.

articles.title: 2nd DPRK-China Economic, Trade, Cultural and Touristic EXPO Held
articles.content:
2nd DPRK-China Economic, Trade, Cultural and Tourism EXPO Held
						
 Dandong, October 10 (KCNA Correspondent) -- The 2nd DPRK-China Economic, Trade, Cultural and Tourism EXPO opened on Thursday with due ceremony in Dandong, China.
					 Colorful events are to be held during the EXPO including trade fair, fine art exhibition, exhibition of photos on tourism and art performance.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were officials of the party and government of Liaoning Province and the city and those in the field of culture, economy and trade including Bing Zhigang, vice-governor of the province, citizens in Dandong, Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy members and diplomatic envoys of different countries to the DPRK.
					
					 Also present there were members of the delegation of the 2nd DPRK-China Economic, Trade, Cultural and Tourism EXPO led by Hong Kil Nam, vice-chairman of North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, Kim Kwang Hun, DPRK consul general to Shenyang, and Choe Un Bok, chairperson of the General Association of Koreans in China.
					
					 An opening speech was made there, which was followed by congratulatory speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that the EXPO will be a good opportunity to swap the successes and experience gained in various fields and boost the cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 They expressed the conviction that it will contribute to deepening the mutual understanding and trust and promoting the friendly and cooperative relations between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 An art performance was given by the National Folk Art Troupe on the same day.
					
					 Prior to this, a reception was given for the participants of the Expo.

articles.title: Music and Dance Performance Marks WPK Birthday
articles.content:
Music and Dance Performance Marks WPK Birthday
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Mansudae Art Troupe gave music and dance performance "Mother" at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday to mark the 16th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 68th anniversary of the WPK.
					 Enjoying the performance were Kim Yong Nam and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, merited people and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Among the audience were overseas compatriots on a visit to the homeland, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreign students studying here.
					
					 The performance began with chorus "We Sing of the Party".
					
					 The repertoire included recital of lyric poem "Mother", mixed trio "Embrace of Party is Our Home", female solo "Oh, Mother Party" and mixed duet "With a Single Heart".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the profound reverence for the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Mixed duet and chorus "Our Leader Loved by People" and female solo and chorus "You Are Mother" truthfully represented the deep confidence of the servicepersons and other people in Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The performance reached a climax with mixed quintet and chorus "Ode to the Motherland".
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience for its high ideological value and artistry.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Students and Other Young People Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Students and Other Young People Held
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Thursday, the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Venues of dancing parties in Pyongyang included the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and the Arch of Triumph where were crowded with youth and students.
					
					 The cheerful parties began with the song "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung Is Great Leader of People".
					
					 The participants presented sea of dances to the tune of songs like "It Is October" and "Party, You Are Our Pleasure".
					
					 Light songs like "Push back Frontiers of the Latest Science" and "Young People, Be Loyal to Our Party" reflected the pride and honor of youth and students who are glorifying their youth as the most active unit in the socialist construction under the care of the mother party whom they follow with their destinies and future entrusted.
					
					 They danced merrily to the tune of songs like "Let's Meet Each Other on the Front", "Footstep" and "July 27 March". 
					
					 Similar parties took place in different parts of the country.

articles.title: Children Presented with Dresses and Foodstuff on WPK's Birthday
articles.content:
Children Presented with Dresses and Foodstuff on WPK's Birthday
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The children of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School, Nampho Revolutionary School and the children of all other revolutionary schools, nursery schools and orphanages and students of all orphans' primary schools and middle schools throughout the country were presented with various kinds of dresses and foodstuff on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 All children and teachers extended profound gratitude to the mother party for having shown particular care and wishing for their future in which they will grow up to be dependable pillars of the country without feeling sorrow as orphans. 
					
					 They said in unison that the party has shown big loving care to bring into full bloom the desires of the great Generalissimos.
					
					 The children expressed their resolutions to prove more successful in the activities of the Children's Union and in study, bearing deep in mind today's happiness, and become excellent talents of the country.

articles.title: Kimilsungia, Kimjongilia Praised at China Flower Expo
articles.content:
Kimilsungia, Kimjongilia Praised at China Flower Expo
 Beijing, October 9 (KCNA) -- The executive chairperson of the Operation Control Center of the Organizing Committee of the 8th China Flower Expo on Oct. 5 highly praised Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias, famous flowers of Korea, peculiarly displayed in the expo. The remark was made when conveying the diplomas of the top prizes which were awarded to the flowers. 
					 The chairperson went on:
					
					 The expo is successfully going on thanks to the worldly famous flowers Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia. 
					
					 I hope that the China-DPRK friendship will be everlasting and more cooperation achieved with the DPRK in the flower field, too. 
					
					 I congratulate once again Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia for winning the top prize of exhibits and top prize of designs in the current expo. 
					
					 The chief of the Invitation Department of the organizing committee of the expo said:
					
					 I am very pleased that Korea's famous Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia are on display at the expo. 
					
					 The immortal flowers are world famous ones quite different from other flowers for their beauty and the circumstances of their birth. 
					
					 I believe that these flowers will be the focus of flower circles not only in China but also in the world. 
					
					 The vice-president of the Azalea Branch of the China Flower Association said:
					
					 The more I see Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia, the more beautiful they look. 
					
					 Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia received the gold prize, the top one, at the 11th China Azalea Exhibition held in April to win unsparing praises from people as world famous flowers. 
					
					 I believe that Korea's famous flowers will earn the biggest popularity in the current expo. 
					
					 The councilor of the Orchid Association of Hainan Province, China said that Kimilsungia is the best flower among orchids and it will earn more fame in the world orchid circle.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime had energetically worked to develop the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into the one that emerges ever-victorious.
					 Under his guidance, the WPK could further glorify its dignity and might year by year.
					
					 Over half a century since when he started working at the WPK Central Committee in June, 1964, he worked heart and soul to turn the WPK into the one characterized by the august name of President Kim Il Sung and his revolutionary idea.
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated Kim Il Sung's revolutionary idea as Kimilsungism and pushed forward the cause of modeling of the whole party and society after Kimilsungism.
					
					 He strengthened the WPK into the motherly party that forms an integral whole with popular masses and serves them to be a steel-like invincible party.
					
					 Under the slogan "Let the Whole Party Go among the Masses!", he called on party officials to be servants who share life and death with the people. 
					
					 Thanks to his energetic guidance, the WPK has turned into a powerful political organization true to the monolithic leadership of the leader.
					
					 In the 1990s when the country was undergoing hardships, he set the Songun (military-first) politics as the principal political mode of the WPK.
					
					 He also turned the Korean People's Army into the main force of the revolution intensely loyal to the party's guidance and achieved the harmonious whole of the Party, the army and the people.
					
					 The WPK, now headed by the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, is further demonstrating its dignity and might.
					
					 With clairvoyant wisdom and energetic ideological and theoretical activities, Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary idea of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, making it the eternal guiding ideology of the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Football Team Beats China's Taipei Team
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Football Team Beats China's Taipei Team 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's football team beat China's Taipei team 7:0 at the 6th East Asian Games in Tianjin, China on Wednesday. 
					 It held the initiative from the beginning and employed diverse attack techniques.
					
					 It will have last match with the Japanese team on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Team Beats Singaporean Team 4:0
articles.content:
DPRK Team Beats Singaporean Team 4:0
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A football match took place between the DPRK team and the Singaporean team for berth to the 2014 Asian U-19 Soccer Championship on Thursday.
					 The DPRK team trounced its Singaporean rival 4:0 in the match held in Bangkok, Thailand.
					
					 It will have last match with the Thai team on Saturday.

articles.title: WPK Is Revolutionary Party Holding Banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism
articles.content:
WPK Is Revolutionary Party Holding Banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's leading newspapers dedicate editorials to the anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on Thursday.
					 They say that the WPK is a revolutionary party struggling for implementing the idea and cause of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il regarding Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the unique guiding idea.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says the idea, exploits and tradition of the Generalissimos are an eternal treasure and guiding principle for the WPK. 
					
					 The paper goes on:
					
					 The WPK has a long history in which it has triumphantly advanced, guided by the idea of the founder and the leader of the party.
					
					 There is no socialist ruling party but the WPK which has made such a long drive by preserving one idea and center and the same roots.
					
					 The WPK rooted on the Down-with-Imperialism Union has achieved the ideological integrity and built a powerful driving force of the Songun revolution on the basis of great guiding idea. It has also worked epoch-making miracles and brought about prosperity, steering the times and history.
					
					 It is the historical review of building a Juche-oriented revolutionary party that holding the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism guarantees the development of the WPK and eternal victory of the revolution.
					
					 Invincible is the cause of the party which has successfully inherited the idea and exploits of the leader through generations.
					
					 The WPK is steering the times and the revolution and the country and nation along the road of victory and demonstrating the dignity as the eternal party of the leaders and the Juche-oriented revolutionary party as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The immutable road ahead of the WPK is only the road of Juche and the victorious banner of the WPK and revolution is great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					   Minju Joson notes that there is no fortress insurmountable by the DPRK as it is led by the WPK which has victorious history and tradition and forms a single-minded unity with the army and people, and that a rosy future is open for the DPRK which advances under the leadership of the WPK.

articles.title: Police Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organizations Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Police Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organizations Protested in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Kyonggi-Inchon Confederation of the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Kyonggi Solidarity for Progress of south Korea made public a statement on Monday in protest against the puppet police fascist repression.
					 The police authorities urged dozens of plainclothes policemen and police mobile force to conduct sudden searches targeting the acting chairman of the Kyonggi-Inchon confederation on Oct. 4, the statement disclosed. It went on:
					
					 The police committed the reckless act by invoking the "Security Law" and Park Geun Hye regime's witch hunt-style suppression, reminding one of the era under the "Yusin" dictatorship, can never be overlooked.
					
					 The regime suppresses the advocates for implementation of the June 15 Joint Declaration, withdrawal of the U.S. troops and conclusion of a peace treaty, charging them with the violation of the SL and branding them as "forces following the north". Its way of thinking is not different from that of the "Yusin" dictator.
					
					 The public security authorities should immediately discontinue the reckless suppression of the reunification movement organizations.

articles.title: KCTU Launches Sit-in Strike
articles.content:
KCTU Launches Sit-in Strike
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a press conference in Seoul Square on Monday and declared it would launch a sit-in strike in demand of the withdrawal of the unpopular policy, according to the south Korean KBS. 
					 The KCTU denounced the Park Geun Hye's regime for not honoring the election commitments on improving people's livelihood. 
					
					 It is the suppression of the labor movement to force the Teachers' Union to expel the dismissed from it, in particular, the organization said. 
					
					 It expressed the will to continue the struggle for people's life, democracy and basic rights of workers.

articles.title: U.S. Criticized for Posing Nuclear Threat to DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Criticized for Posing Nuclear Threat to DPRK
 Beijing, October 10 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China Wednesday made public a statement. 
					 The statement said that Koreans in China strongly denounced the U.S. imperialists for posing nuclear threat to the DPRK upon hearing the statement issued by the spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army on Monday. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists plan to stage nuclear war exercises against the DPRK by mobilizing task force of nuclear-powered carrier George Washington, it said, and went on:
					
					 As shown before the world, the U.S. is the mastermind of the hostile policy toward the DPRK, chieftain which produced the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula and the party threatening the DPRK with nukes. 
					
					 Koreans in China do not believe the stories spread by high-ranking officials of the U.S. Administration that they have no intent to pursue hostile policy to the DPRK and have no attempt to mount an attack on the DPRK. 
					
					 Koreans in China strongly warn the U.S. together with the world people desirous of justice. 
					
					 The U.S. should take a bold decision for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula at once if it does not want to face self-destruction by aiming at nuclear attack. 
					
					 Koreans in China ardently love the glorious country which has the might of single-minded unity characterized by the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, nuclear force and powerful military power. We together with the people in the homeland will revenge the aggressors thousand-fold times if they dare provoke the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet authorities should clearly know that the DPRK is fully ready to cope with their provocations.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Praise WPK
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Praise WPK
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in Indonesia and Ethiopia in the period between October 1 and 3 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The director of the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia said that the WPK founded by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and developed by Generalissimo Kim Jong Il has achieved brilliant exploits for the past 68 years in leading the Korean people.
					
					 He praised President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as great men respected not only by the Korean people but the progressive mankind.
					
					 The chief designer of an Ethiopian company noted that the WPK has guided the Korean people to the road of victory and glory under the wise leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The director of an Ethiopian general hospital stated that the WPK has pursued the politics for the popular masses in reliance on them and advanced toward victory even when many countries and parties in the world suffered from political upheavals.
					
					 A vice director of the Ethiopian Gabriel Hospital highly praised the WPK as a powerful party and a vice director of a hospital stressed that there is no political party but the WPK which has demonstrated victory for nearly 70 years even though there are many parties in the world.

articles.title: Seminars Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars Held Abroad 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place by the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the Communist Party of Tajikistan from October 2 to 4 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, said:
					
					 All great victories won by the DPRK along with the glorious history of the WPK are unthinkable without President Kim Il Sung who founded the immortal Juche idea and successfully embodied it and leader Kim Jong Il who successfully inherited and developed the cause of the President with his distinguished leadership capacity.
					
					 Any moves of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges to stifle the DPRK went bust as supreme leader Kim Jong Un assumed a heavy responsibility as the first secretary of the WPK and has further consolidated the might of the socialist power.
					
					 Grishkov, first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, noted that the past 68 years proved that the party of the working class can successfully discharge its mission and receive support from the broad masses only when it is led by a great leader.
					
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, said that the Korean people are united closely in thinking and will and in terms of moral obligation under the benevolent politics of the WPK.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held by the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia.

articles.title: Final Victory of WPK Convinced by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Final Victory of WPK Convinced by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks, lectures and film shows were held in Russia, the Czech Republic, Malaysia, Thailand and Mongolia in the period from October 3 to 5 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Participants in film shows watched the Korean films including "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					 The acting chairperson of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of A Just Russia said:
					
					 The WPK will further highly demonstrate its invincible might under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The WPK is the most dignified party in the world which sets store by the relations with all the progressive political parties.
					
					 We will make positive efforts for the development of the friendly relations with the DPRK.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party (CCP) said that he extended warm congratulations to the WPK and people of the DPRK marking the 68th anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Our two parties have closely cooperated with each other for the past period.
					
					 The CCP upholds leader Kim Jong Il as its honorary member.
					
					 We are convinced that the WPK will continuously advance along the road of socialism and win the final victory without fail.
					
					 The director general of the Malaysian FP Company praised Kim Jong Un as the greatest man born of Heaven in terms of pluck and leadership, and the WPK will be invincible thanks to him.
					
					 The president of a Thai company praised undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il in developing the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung and turning the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power.
					
					 Adopted at an event held in Mongolia was a congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Holidays Observed by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
DPRK Holidays Observed by Foreign Newspapers 
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of various countries dedicated special write-ups to the 16th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 68th anniversary of the WPK.
					 The October 2 issue of the Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud dedicated one whole page to an article titled "Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK" with his smiling portrait.
					
					 The paper dealt in detail with the fact that Kim Jong Il was elected general secretary of the WPK on Oct. 8, 1997 and bolstered the political, ideological and military might of the country in every way, upholding the banner of Songun, and that he laid out the grand plan for building a thriving nation and energetically led the struggle for realizing it.
					
					 The October 3 issue of the Lao newspaper Congtap Pasason Lao carried a picture of Marshal Kim Jong Un and edited an article praising his greatness.
					
					 The paper introduced in detail the fact that love for the people is the starting point of all thinking and activities of Kim Jong Un and the highest principle and aim of politics pursued by him.
					
					 The October 1 issue of a newspaper of the United Arab Emirates carried an article titled "October 10 is the anniversary of the WPK" with a photo of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper said the WPK founded and wisely led by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il has been further strengthened and developed under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The September 30 issue of the Myanmar newspaper The New Age carried an article with a photo of Kim Jong Un in which it praised his popular traits.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Observed in Britain
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Observed in Britain
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The New Communist Party of Britain issued a bulletin titled "Solidarity to the DPRK" on October 4 on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The bulletin noted that British revolutionaries looked back with deep emotion upon the immortal exploits achieved by President Kim Il Sung in building the WPK on the occasion of October 10.
					
					 It said:
					
					 Under the present situation it is necessary for the world revolutionaries to study again the work "Let Us Repudiate the Left Adventurist Line and Follow the Revolutionary Organizational Line" authored by Kim Il Sung on May 20, 1931.
					
					 His work serves as a highly important document to be regarded as guidelines by the world revolutionaries and progressive people struggling against the imperialists' aggression and war moves.
					
					 It introduced the fact that in Britain various political parties and social organizations have supported the Korean people's just cause and conducted the positive solidarity activities accusing the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces of their moves against the DPRK and reunification.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Posts Kim Il Sung's Work on Its Website
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Posts Kim Il Sung's Work on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website "3. Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully", part of President Kim Il Sung's famous work "Report to the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee", on October 3.
					 This part of the work, made public on October 10, Juche 69 (1980), deals with the efforts the Workers' Party of Korea has made for national reunification in the period under review, and indicates the tasks to be fulfilled for independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 It also clarifies the new reunification proposal to establish the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) on the basis of the Three Principles of National Reunification and the 10-point administrative policy to be pursued by the DFRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en dia de fundacion del PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en dia de fundacion del PTC
						
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito a la hora 0 del 10 de octubre el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del 68o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y rindio homenaje a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					En la ceremonia de homenaje participaron el vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC; el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC, Ri Yong Gil, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC; el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC, Jang Jong Nam, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, y otros comandantes del EPC, los comandantes de los tipos de ejercito y las unidades de nivel de cuerpo de ejercito y los miembros ejecutivos del Comite del PTC en el EPC.
					
					El Mariscal entro en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos.
					
					Fueron colocados ahi un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal y el otro a nombre del EPC.
					
					Seguidamente, entro en el salon de eternidad donde se conserva el cuerpo del Presidente y recorrio la sala de conservacion de ordenes recibidas por el, el hall de llantos y las salas de conservacion del tren y el carro usados por el.
					
					Estuvo en el otro salon de eternidad donde se conserva el cuerpo del Dirigente e hizo un recorrido por la sala de conservacion de ordenes y las otras de conservacion del auto, el carro electrico, el barco y el tren usados por el.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se retrata con profesores e investigadores que se mudaran a nuevas viviendas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se retrata con profesores e investigadores que se mudaran a nuevas viviendas
						
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, en compania de Ri Sol Ju, se fotografio junto con los profesores e investigadores que se mudaran a las nuevas viviendas construidas para los educadores de la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					En la filmacion estuvieron presentes Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Kim Ki Nam y Choe Thae Bok, miembros del Buro Politico y secretarios del CC del PTC, Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Thae Hyong Chol, rector general de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, y Kim Thae Hi, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en el mismo plantel docente.
					
					El Mariscal respondio sonriente a las aclamaciones de los participantes en la ocasion.
					
					Hizo votos por lo que los profesores y los investigadores de la universidad, patriotas que educan a las generaciones venideras y dedican toda su vida a la formacion de talentosos recursos humanos del pais, lleven una vida culta y feliz en las nuevas viviendas concentrandose en la pedagogia y los estudios cientificos.
					
					Tomo la foto de recuerdo con los participantes expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos lograran mayores exitos en sus trabajos al cumplir perfectamente la autoctona idea y politica del partido sobre la educacion.

articles.title: CRPP condena nuevo escandalo que arma la camarilla de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CRPP condena nuevo escandalo que arma la camarilla de Park Geun-hye
						
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, la banda titere surcoreana arma escandalo cuestionando otra vez el problema del registro de la cumbre Norte-Sur.
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria publico hoy la siguiente declaracion:
					
					El dia 2, la fiscalia surcoreana publico el resultado intermedio de investigacion, segun el cual el anterior "gobierno" de Roh Moo Hyun conservo el registro de la cumbre Norte-Sur de 2007 en la base de datos individuales de Roh sin trasladarlo al Archivo y tacho el borrador del mismo documento. 
					
					Ahora Chongwadae (Casa Azul) y los compinches del "Partido Saenuri" describen el caso como "cancelacion de la version original de dato historico" y "perturbacion de la disciplina estatal" y expresan la voluntad de publicar hasta las grabaciones de la cumbre para verificar si hubo retoques en el registro mencionando la supuesta "renuncia de la linea de limite al Norte" y la "postura baja".
					
					Hasta los medios de prensa conservadores, unidos a aquellos, acusan a las fuerzas opositoras armando escandalo como si hubieran descubierto un gran crimen.
					
					A pesar de la advertencia de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la censura interna y externa del pais, la banda surcoreana vuelve a escandalizar el problema del registro de la cumbre Norte-Sur.
					
					Con esta accion grosera, ella revelo por si sola su naturaleza de corruptos y gangsteres capaces de cualquier cosa para alcanzar sus sucias ambiciones politicas.
					
					Como ya declaramos con solemnidad, el registro en cuestion no es un problema interno del Sur de Corea, sino cuestion importante relacionada con la dignidad de nuestra Direccion Suprema.
					
					No hay en ningun pais del mundo el antecedente de publicacion de los registros de las conversaciones entre los jefes de Estado.
					
					Pero la camarilla surcoreana censuro la cumbre Norte-Sur, que debe considerarse sagrada y absoluta, armo escandalo con sus notas y hasta insiste en publicar las grabaciones correspondientes.
					
					Esta canallada demuestra que ellos son bribones politicos que no toman en cuenta las basicas referencias diplomaticas ni la cortesia y el principio de dialogo.
					
					El CRPP condena y denuncia categoricamente esa campana brutal calificandola de una burla a nuestra maxima dignidad y de grave provocacion politica a la RPDC.
					
					Ahora los titeres surcoreanos incriminan a las personalidades justicieras, que hicieron aporte al acontecimiento significativo que abrio la coyuntura de viraje de la reunificacion de la patria, vinculandolas con el absurdo caso del registro de la cumbre. Pero, el verdadero criminal que debe ser juzgado es la banda de conservadores que niega totalmente las declaraciones historicas aprobadas en las Cumbres Norte-Sur y malemplea su enorme importancia y proeza historica nacional en las pugnas politicas para satisfacer los intereses y estrategia partidistas. 
					
					Detras de esa campana sucia esta Park Geun-hye. 
					
					Como demuestra el caso de intervencion del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia en las pasadas elecciones presidenciales, Park es la autora que uso al SNI para usurpar el "poder". Y cuando llegaron al extremo las criticas de la opinion publica y de la poblacion por el respecto, nombro como presidente del SNI a Nam Jae Jun de mala fama para que inventara el caso del registro de la cumbre y lanzara la campana de represion a las "fuerzas pro-Norte". 
					
					Ademas, la banda de Park realiza con EE.UU. los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC insultando brutalmente la maxima dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC y burlando sus esfuerzos por el dialogo y negociaciones intercoreanos y lleva asi a la fase catastrofica las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					Ahora Park esta de visita en el Sudeste Asiatico sin dejar de calumniar a la RPDC. 
					
					Insatisfecha de su campana de enfrentamiento fratricida que parte de la extremada hostilidad a la connacional RPDC, la horda de groseros malemplean hasta las notas de la Cumbre Norte-Sur en sus siniestros objetivos soliendo hablar de la "cortesia" y "confianza", lo cual es un acto muy indignante. 
					
					La presente campana parte del intento de salir del atolladero en que cayo la banda surcoreana por la ruptura de las relaciones intercoreanas y la crisis interna y externa, ocupar la posicion ventajosa en las inmediatas elecciones suplementarias, y a la larga, reprimir y exterminar a las personalidades patrioticas pro-reunificacion y otras fuerzas democraticas y reformistas y tomar el control total del territorio surcoreano. 
					
					Pero, los titeres surcoreanos no podran obtener nada con el presente complot. 
					
					No estaremos con brazos cruzados ante la situacion actual en que las notas de la Cumbre Norte-Sur son insultadas por los maniacos de confrontacion. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben saber que nosotros tambien podemos dar a la publicidad las palabras adulantes que dijeron los politiqueros y enviados especiales surcoreanos durante sus visitas a la RPDC. 
					
					En ese caso, el Sur de Corea caera, sin duda alguna, en el peor disturbio y sera mas incomoda todavia la situacion de las actuales autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Estamos observando atentamente la evolucion de la situacion del Sur de Corea. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia teniendo presente nuestra advertencia de que ellos seran totalmente responsables de las graves consecuencias de su campana del registro de la cumbre Norte-Sur que agrava el enfrentamiento entre ambas partes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de dirigentes chinos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de dirigentes chinos
						
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, junto con el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, Kim Yong Nam, y el primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, Pak Pong Ju, recibio un mensaje de respuesta que le enviaran el dia 8 Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China y de la Comision Militar Central de la RPCh, Li Keqiang, primer ministro del Consejo de Estado de la RPCh, y Zhang Dejiang, presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional de la RPCh.
					El texto senala:
					
					Les agradecemos sinceramente por las calidas felicitaciones que nos extendieron por el 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular China.
					
					Estamos convencidos de que en la nueva epoca y bajo la nueva situacion, se desarrollaran sin parar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre China y Corea gracias a los esfuerzos conjuntos de los dos partidos, los gobiernos y los pueblos de los dos paises.
					
					Formulamos votos por la prosperidad de la RPDC y por la felicidad del pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Se ofrece funcion de Conjunto Artistico Mansudae
articles.content:
Se ofrece funcion de Conjunto Artistico Mansudae
Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Conjunto Artistico Mansudae ofrecio este jueves en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este la funcion de musica y danza "Madre" en celebracion del 16o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del 68o  de la fundacion de esta organizacion politica.
					La presenciaron Kim Yong Nam y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, benemeritos y otros trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Fueron invitados los compatriotas en ultramar, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y los estudiantes extranjeros en Corea.
					
					La funcion fue iniciada con el coro "Cantamos el partido".
					
					En la escena fue recitada la poesia lirica "Madre" y se pusieron el trio mixto "El regazo del Partido es la casa en que vivimos", el solo femenino "Partido madre" y el duo mixto "Una sola voluntad.
					
					Los ejecutantes alabaron el sentimiento de infinito respeto y veneracion a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					En el duo mixto y coro "Nuestro dirigente adorado por el pueblo" y el solo femenino y coro "Partido es madre", los ejecutantes describieron bien el ardiente sentimiento de confianza de todo el ejercito y pueblo hacia el Mariscal Kim Jong Il.
					
					La funcion arranco efusivas ovaciones de los espectadores por su alto caracter ideo-artistico.
